quotes.quote: Don't nurture a sense of guilt; rather, nurture a sense of responsibility married with a sense of humility.
If you nurture your mind, body, and spirit, your time will expand. You will gain a new perspective that will allow you to accomplish much more.
Nurture your great spirit for a great self.
Learn to nurture and trust your instincts as well as your conscious reasoning. Often, one's instincts will offer the better judgment.
You cannot create genius. All you can do is nurture it.
Each one of us has a natural instinct to rise, like a flame of the lamp. Lets nurture this instinct.
We must nurture tolerance, collective wisdom, and democracy.
To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body, but the soul.
Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
We nurture our creativity when we release our inner child. Let it run and roam free. It will take you on a brighter journey.
We must recognize and nurture the creative parts of each other without always understanding what will be created.
Nature is a definite thing. But nurture is just as powerful. It can really mess with you.
Nurture your own confidence and make it real; don't pretend to be someone you're not.
The more you nurture a feeling of loving kindness, the happier and calmer you will be.
Let us nurture the practice of family values, by embracing policies that value families.
If you nurture Life, Life will nurture you.
We all nurture impulses which promise freedom from the demands of others, even if that freedom means death.
Nurture doubt as a creative strategy.
Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
We must nurture and love, if life is to have any real meaning. But First we must find a way to survive against the things that prevent us from doing so.
Nurture strength of spirit to shield you in sudden misfortune. But do not distress yourself with imaginings. Many fears are born of fatigue and loneliness.
You must nurture the force within you. You are the only person that can behold the divine force for your divine purpose.
Nurture the spontaneous peaceful life.
People who continue to nurture long-term and new friendships as they grow older are more likely to enjoy health and vitality.
Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
To nurture your career, it makes sense to cultivate your strengths. To nurture your moral core, it is necessary to confront your weaknesses.
My hope is that we continue to nurture the places that we love, but that we also look outside our immediate worlds.
Nurture the qualities in yourself that you desire in your friends.
For good nurture and education implant good constitutions.
Great coaches are visionaries. Great coaches instill, nurture, and encourage vision, then model and motivate surrender to it.
